attributes.action: Make Bus Stop Times More Accurate And Creation Of New Buses That Travel The Same Route As Well As Cheaper Fares
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Have two or more buses that travel the same route which means people are more able to catch the bus on time and get to the there designated stop.

2. Better and more accurate bus times.

3. To stop the increase of bus fares that rise practically every year.
